examples.en: She enjoys dancing in the park.
They danced at the party last night.
examples.zh: 他们昨晚在派对上跳舞了。

examples.en: He danced with her at the wedding.
examples.zh: 他在婚礼上和她跳舞了。

examples.en: They have danced together many times.
examples.zh: 他们已经一起跳过很多次舞了。

examples.en: She has never danced in public before.
examples.zh: 她以前从未在公共场合跳舞过。
